items.name: api_login_id
items.title: API Login ID
items.tooltip: In this section, you will need to provide the API login ID that you have obtained from Authorize.Net

items.name: transaction_key
items.title: Transaction Key
items.tooltip: In this section you will need to enter the transaction key that you have obtained from Authorize.Net

items.name: faliure_attempt
items.title: Connection Error Failure Attempts
items.tooltip: Connection related failures occur when connection between client and server do not setup properly. These faliures also include payment processing faliures. It is recommended that its value should be greater than 3

items.name: auth_faliure_attempt
items.title: Authorization Related Failure Attempts
items.tooltip: Authorization Failure occurs when user enter fake credit card details or the credit card details are not working properly.

items.name: company_name
items.title: Display Company Name
items.tooltip: This option determines if the company name should be displayed in the form
